title: Convert failed if resize preprocess is not applied
body:
In blueoil, we use a sample image to make an inference when exporting, but since the image size of the sample image is fixed, if we don't resize it in pre-processing, it will fail here.

https://github.com/blue-oil/blueoil/blob/8acb3c4564091e7cf7cf67afb43e0f300f0ea0b7/blueoil/cmd/export.py#L29-L32

https://github.com/blue-oil/blueoil/blob/8acb3c4564091e7cf7cf67afb43e0f300f0ea0b7/blueoil/cmd/export.py#L120-L125

The input image can be changed by the argument of export, but it cannot be changed when it is converted.

https://github.com/blue-oil/blueoil/blob/8acb3c4564091e7cf7cf67afb43e0f300f0ea0b7/blueoil/cmd/export.py#L224-L234

https://github.com/blue-oil/blueoil/blob/8acb3c4564091e7cf7cf67afb43e0f300f0ea0b7/blueoil/cmd/convert.py#L158

Therefore, if you don't use resizing for preprocessing when converting, the export will fail.
